My 8 year old daughter was systematically bullied at school ,the school did nothing to protect her .Schools should be made accountable for their failings in dealing with bullies and Ofsted should consider this in their ratings.Any school failing to deal with Bullying through the correct procedures should be stripped of qualifying for Outstanding /Good status.
I have had to change my daughter schools in order to protect her ,thus leaving behind her friends ,whilst the bully who broke her nose is free to carry on regardless of the damage he has caused.The education department have done nothing to help despite the fact I have won my complaint against the school.Please support me i trying to bring about changes in the way our schools deal with bullies and bullying.
